events.notes: Policy limits demand of $25,000 sent to defense counsel Allison L. Rief (allison@dilbeckandmyers.com). Response deadline is 5:00 PM EST on 12/23/25. Check for response and follow up if none received. Document response or non-response. Advise attorney on next steps (potential lawsuit filing, bad faith considerations).
